GENE VON HAUl_BERG
Il_I_IN01S 9-8761
HARMONY HALIv„.
INC. J ^ 1956
POPEST N
Mr, R.E.Underwood,Jr,,
Network Manager,
Natl, Assoc, of Edu¬
cational Broadcasters,
Un, of Illinois, Re:Friendly Philosopher
119 Gregory Hall, Tape and script
Urbana,Ill,
Dear Sir:
I have not yet received any word from
your committee regarding the acceptance or re¬
jection of the taped radio program I submitted
last summer.
Whether accepted or not, I would appre¬
ciate the return of my tape and script, as these
may be of use to me in future.
It was interesting to read your ex¬
planation of the methods by which programs are
financed for your network,as well as reading the
pamphlet you kindly enclosed. It is evident that
regardless of the committee’s decision, it would
not be feasible for me to present any tapes for
your organization.
Thank you for your courtesy.
Yours truly.
Gene von Hallberg
y.r*cr ^
Kindly send tape to my home address—
6387 Pitchett St,,
Forest Hills,N,Y,
